title: Echo Crisis Unleashed
outcome: Three days after the assemblies at the mural, citizens experience disturbing echoes from their past as old, archived BCI profiles resurface after the Mosaic Reversion. Personal secrets, lost histories, and painful memories haunt individuals citywide, destabilizing trust and sparking calls for data deletion. Officials scramble to contain fears while the Council fractures over blame and handling of the crisis.

events.description: Citizens report disturbing, hyper-personal BCI 'echoes'—old penalty notices, contact bans, and flagged secrets appear in public and private spaces.
Council debates whether to acknowledge the glitch or blame dissident tampering. Oksana Lintz pressures IT to isolate rogue archive code responsible for echoes.
Demands surge to delete personal BCI archives. Spontaneous demonstrations at the mural force Council members to make public appearances, exposing insecurity.
Directorate launches selective 'archive erasure' operations. Political pressure mounts when privileged citizens discover their histories are targeted for removal, widening class rifts.
Trust in BCI collapses after leaked evidence shows some privileged histories were shielded. Society becomes sharply divided over who controls the past.
